name: ts-for-gir
description: Typescript .d.ts generator from GIR for gjs

scripts.publish:app:next: yarn workspaces foreach -v --all --parallel --no-private --include '@ts-for-gir/*' npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag next --access public
scripts.publish:app:latest: yarn workspaces foreach -v --all --parallel --no-private --include '@ts-for-gir/*' npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag latest --access public
scripts.publish:types:next: yarn workspaces foreach -v --all --parallel --no-private --include '@girs/*' npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag next --access public
scripts.publish:types:latest: yarn workspaces foreach -v --all --parallel --no-private --include '@girs/*' npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag latest --access public
scripts.test: yarn build:all && yarn test:girs:all && yarn validate:examples && yarn start:cli-examples:all
scripts.test:girs:all: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:all && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:vda1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:vda1 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gtk2 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk3: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gtk3 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gtk4 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gtk3+gtk4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gtk3+gtk4 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gio: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gio && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:vte4: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:vte4 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:modemmanager1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:modemmanager1 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:timezonemap1: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:timezonemap1 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:rygelcore2: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:rygelcore2 && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.test:girs:gjs:gcalc: yarn clear:types && yarn build:types:gcalc && yarn validate:types:root
scripts.build: yarn build:parser && yarn build:lib && yarn build:generators && yarn build:cli
scripts.build:generators: yarn build:generator-base && yarn build:generator-typescript && yarn build:generator-html-doc
scripts.start:cli-examples:gjs: yarn workspace ts-for-gir-glib-2-spawn-command-example run start && yarn workspace ts-for-gir-gio-2-cat-promisify-packages run start
scripts.build:types:packages:all: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=25600 yarn ts-for-gir generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.packages-all.rc.js' && yarn install
scripts.build:types:packages:gtk4: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=25600 yarn ts-for-gir generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.packages-gtk4.rc.js' && yarn install

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
